alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 2:31AM CDT until June 15 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern York County in east central Nebraska... Northeastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Southern Polk County in east central Nebraska... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 231 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Hampton, or 14 miles northwest of York, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Polk around 235 AM CDT. Benedict around 245 AM CDT. Stromsburg around 250 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Gresham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
